title: The Newest MLUKE sandbox test yet on Overtime

article.headerHtml: Win a share of 500,000 ARB using Overtime Markets until March 31, 2024

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn kickback for playing Singles and Parlays on Overtime Markets. The higher your volume, the higher your rewards. Additionally, get loss rebates if you’re providing liquidity to Sports AMM and Parlay AMM and there is a negative PnL round.  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard .

article.title: The Biggest ARB Incentives Program on Overtime Ever
article.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industrys standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. article.headerHtml: Win a share of 500,000 ARB using Overtime Markets until March 31, 2024

ctaSection.sectionHtml: Earn kickback for playing Singles and Parlays on Overtime Markets. The higher your volume, the higher your rewards. Additionally, get loss rebates if you’re providing liquidity to Sports AMM and Parlay AMM and there is a negative PnL round.  Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.

article.contentHtml:
Take advantage of the biggest Arbitrum incentives program on Overtime Markets ever! Until March 31, you can receive kickbacks for virtually everything you do on Overtime Markets on Arbitrum: providing liquidity, as well as playing Singles and Parlays.

The plan is to have a total of 7 reward rounds. The exact amount of rewards per each biweekly round will be published here, as well as on Twitter.

Below you can find a detailed breakdown of reward buckets and amounts.

Thales Sports Markets

The biweekly round will allocate 10,000 ARB of incentives to Thales Sports Markets. These 10,000 ARB will be split in the following way:

Singles Rewards: 5,000 ARB


Users who buy Singles on Thales SportsAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Singles Volume compared to the global Singles Volume during that period.

 Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.

 

Parlay Rewards: 5,000 ARB
 

Users who buy Parlay Tickets on Thales ParlayAMM will have their Buy Volume counted for this rewards bucket. They will split 5,000 ARB rewards at the end of the two weeks pro rata based on their total Parlay Volume compared to the global Parlay Volume during that period.

 Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.

 

AMM Liquidity Providing Loss Rebates

If you don’t already know, you an provide liquidity for Overtime Markets and ‘be the house’ and share its profits by participating in two liquidity pools: SportsAMM and ParlayAMM

Loss Rebates ARB rewards are reserved to be distributed to AMM Liquidity Providers in case of a negative PnL week. Rewards are meant to be equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing across SportsAMM and ParlayAMM.

The biweekly round of ARB rewards will reserve a hard cap of 10,000 ARB tokens for Loss Rebates equal to 90% of dollar value of potential losses incurred from AMM Liquidity Providing.

Any AMM LP losses incurred within these two rounds will be eligible for ARB rewards from this round.

In case the 90% of dollar value of Liquidity Providing losses for the mentioned two weeks is greater than the dollar value of 10,000 ARB on January 10th, the 10,000 ARB will be split pro rata between all LPs that incurred losses based on their comparison to global PnL losses of their respective pool.

 Track your rewards: Dune dashboard.
 

You can earn additional incentives by using other products built on Thales Protocol. For more information, check out this link. 

Don’t miss out on the other great incentives on Overtime

 

Overtime regularly organizes kickbacks, dedicated rewards for the biggest sports events and leagues, and sportsbook competitions.

 

You can use the promotions page to keep an eye out for ongoing and future goodies you can grab, as well as find out how to qualify and how your wallet is doing on the rewards leaderboard.
